summary: Creates a new folder called "output_path", then uses the 'basic-pitch' command to convert MIDI files from "/media/root/help/pyjom/tests/bilibili_practices/bilibili_tarot/some_bgm.mp3" into audio format, saving them in the newly created folder.

details.comment: Creates a new folder called "output_path", then uses the 'basic-pitch' command to convert MIDI files from "/media/root/help/pyjom/tests/bilibili_practices/bilibili_tarot/some_bgm.mp3" into audio format, saving them in the newly created folder.
